Package log_update_from_parking_slots

Class ParkingSlots

java.lang.Object
log_update_from_parking_slots.ParkingSlots
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogObservable
public class ParkingSlots extends Object implements LogObservable
This class describes a parking slot of a docking station. It implements the interface LogObservable by notifying LogObserver corresponding to LogFinishedtrips when a bike is parked in the parking slot.
